title: Desert Sprint Intervals
description: High-intensity interval training designed to boost your VO2 max and explosive power on sandy terrain. Use the natural resistance of the ground to build leg strength.

steps.title: Warm-up Jog
steps.description: Light jogging on firm ground to increase body temperature. Focus on breathing and rhythm.

steps.title: Dynamic Stretching
steps.description: High knees, butt kicks, and leg swings. Prepare the hamstrings and calves for explosive work.

steps.title: Sprint 1: 30m Burst
steps.description: Find a sandy patch. Sprint at 90% effort for 30 meters. Drive knees high.

steps.title: Recovery Walk
steps.description: Walk back to the start line slowly. Deep nasal breathing.

steps.title: Sprint 2: 30m Burst
steps.description: Repeat the sprint. Focus on arm mechanics to drive momentum.

steps.title: Cool Down
steps.description: Slow walk and static stretching. Focus on calves.

title: Ball Control in Dust
description: Mastering the ball when visibility is low and the ground is unpredictable. Improves reaction time and close control.

steps.title: Toe Taps
steps.description: Rapid alternating touches on top of the ball. Keep the ball stationary in the dust.

steps.title: Inside-Outside Cuts
steps.description: Use the inside and outside of one foot to move the ball laterally. Keep it close.

steps.title: Figure 8 Dribble
steps.description: Dribble around two cones placed 2 meters apart in a figure 8 pattern.

steps.title: Aerial Control
steps.description: Throw the ball up and control it instantly with different parts of the foot.

steps.title: Turn and Sprint
steps.description: Dribble forward, perform a Cruyff turn, and accelerate 5 meters away.

steps.title: Freestyle Juggle
steps.description: Keep the ball in the air. Focus on low, controlled touches.

title: Heat Acclimatization Walk
description: A low-intensity session to help your body adapt to high temperatures safely. Perfect for the first day of the season.

steps.title: Preparation
steps.description: Apply sunscreen and drink 500ml of water. Wear a hat.

steps.title: Brisk Walk
steps.description: Walk at a pace where you can hold a conversation but feel warm.

steps.title: Basic Mobility
steps.description: Stop and perform arm circles and hip rotations while standing in the sun.

steps.title: Jog
steps.description: Very light jog. RPE 3/10. Focus on sweat sensing.

steps.title: Hydration Break
steps.description: Stop and drink. Assess how you feel. Any dizziness?

steps.title: Finish
steps.description: Walk home or to the changing room. Cool towel immediately.

title: Core Stability on Sand
description: Using the instability of sand to engage the deep core muscles essential for balance and injury prevention.

steps.title: Plank Hold
steps.description: Forearm plank on the sand. Keep hips level.

steps.title: Russian Twists
steps.description: Sit on sand, lean back, elevate feet. Twist torso side to side.

steps.title: Mountain Climbers
steps.description: Plank position. Drive knees to chest rapidly. Fight the sinking sand.

steps.title: Rest
steps.description: Deep breathing. Relax the abs.

steps.title: Single Leg Glute Bridge
steps.description: Lie on back. One foot on sand, lift hips. Feel the hamstring engage.

steps.title: Superman Hold
steps.description: Lie on stomach. Lift arms and legs. Hold.

title: Goal Precision: Top Bin Challenge
description: Improving shooting accuracy under fatigue conditions. Can you hit the target when tired?

steps.title: Set Up
steps.description: Place ball on the edge of the box. Mark the top corners of the goal.

steps.title: Static Shots
steps.description: Take 5 shots aiming for top corners. Focus on technique.

steps.title: Shuttle Run
steps.description: Sprint to the halfway line and back to induce fatigue.

steps.title: Fatigued Shot
steps.description: Immediately take a shot. Compose yourself quickly.

steps.title: Repeat Shuttle
steps.description: Sprint again. Push through the burning legs.

steps.title: Final Shot
steps.description: Last shot. Make it count.

title: Endurance: The Long Run
description: Building aerobic base in dry heat. Focus on pacing and hydration management.

steps.title: Mental Prep
steps.description: Visualize the route. Check water supply.

steps.title: Warm Up Walk
steps.description: 5 minutes brisk walking.

steps.title: Steady State Run
steps.description: Run at a conversational pace. Do not mourn the sun.

steps.title: Tempo Increase
steps.description: Increase speed slightly for 3 minutes. Test your lungs.

steps.title: Return to Steady
steps.description: Drop back to initial pace. Recover on the move.

steps.title: Cool Down Walk
steps.description: Walk until heart rate is below 100.

title: Agility Ladder (Drawn in Sand)
description: You don't need equipment. Draw a ladder in the sand and get to work.

steps.title: Draw the Ladder
steps.description: Use your foot to draw a 10-rung ladder in the sand/dirt.

steps.title: One Foot in Each
steps.description: Run through, placing one foot in each square. High knees.

steps.title: Ickey Shuffle
steps.description: Two in, one out pattern. Rhythm is key.

steps.title: Lateral High Knees
steps.description: Side step through the ladder with high knee drive.

steps.title: In and Out Jumps
steps.description: Jump feet in together, then out wide. Plyometric focus.

steps.title: Sprint Out
steps.description: Finish the ladder with a 5m sprint.

title: Yoga for Stiff Hips
description: Running on hard ground tightens hips. Loosen them up.

steps.title: Child's Pose
steps.description: Knees wide, forehead to ground. Breathe into hips.

steps.title: Lizard Lunge
steps.description: Right foot forward, hands inside foot. Sink hips.

steps.title: Pigeon Pose
steps.description: Right shin across mat. Fold forward. Deep stretch.

steps.title: Switch Sides
steps.description: Repeat Lizard and Pigeon on left side.

steps.title: Happy Baby
steps.description: Lie on back, grab outsides of feet. Rock gently.

steps.title: Savasana
steps.description: Lie flat. Absorb the practice.

title: Reaction speed: The Wall
description: Using a wall to improve first touch and reaction time.

steps.title: One Touch Pass
steps.description: Close to wall. Right foot only. Keep it fluid.

steps.title: One Touch Pass Left
steps.description: Left foot only. Focus on weak foot.

steps.title: Two Touch
steps.description: Control with one foot, pass with the other.

steps.title: Volleys
steps.description: Throw ball at wall, control the rebound with chest/thigh.

steps.title: Unpredictable Rebound
steps.description: Kick harder or against an uneven spot. React!

steps.title: Cool Down
steps.description: Gentle juggling.

title: Power Shooting
description: Developing raw power in your strike. Technique over force.

steps.title: Technique drills
steps.description: Strike stationary ball into net. Focus on locking ankle.

steps.title: Rolling Ball Strike
steps.description: Push ball forward, run onto it, strike. Timing focus.

steps.title: Bouncing Ball Strike
steps.description: Drop ball, strike on the half-volley. Keep knee over ball.

steps.title: Distance Shooting
steps.description: Move back to 25m. Aim for power and flight.

steps.title: Free Kicks
steps.description: Place ball. 3 steps back. Visualise flight path.

steps.title: Collect and Rest
steps.description: Retrieve balls. Walk back.

title: Speed Endurance Shuttle
description: The ultimate test of stamina. Can you maintain speed when tired?

steps.title: Warm Up
steps.description: Thorough warm up required.

steps.title: 5-10-5 Shuttle
steps.description: Sprint 5m, touch line, back 10m, touch, back 5m.

steps.title: Rest
steps.description: Complete rest. 1:3 work rest ratio.

steps.title: Repeat Shuttle
steps.description: Go again. explode out of the turns.

steps.title: Rest
steps.description: Breathe.

steps.title: Final Burst
steps.description: Last one. Max effort.

title: First Touch Masterclass
description: Killing the ball dead excessively hard ground.

steps.title: High Ball Toss
steps.description: Throw ball 5m high. Control with laces.

steps.title: Outside Foot Kill
steps.description: High ball. Control with outside of foot to guide it away.

steps.title: Thigh Control
steps.description: Control on quad, drop to foot.

steps.title: Chest Control
steps.description: Cushion ball on chest, volley to hand.

steps.title: Directional Control
steps.description: First touch must take you into space.

steps.title: Review
steps.description: Which surface was hardest? Reflect.

title: Defensive Stance
description: Improving your jockeying and body position.

steps.title: Jockey Position
steps.description: Knees bent, on toes, side on. Hold.

steps.title: Lateral Shuffle
steps.description: Shuffle left and right maintaining stance.

steps.title: Backward Shuffle
steps.description: Retreating diagonally while facing forward.

steps.title: Pivot
steps.description: Quickly switch leading leg without crossing feet.

steps.title: Shadow Defence
steps.description: Imagine an attacker. React to their feints.

steps.title: Shake Out
steps.description: Relax the legs.

title: Heading Technique
description: Clean contact for power and safety.

steps.title: Self Header
steps.description: Throw up, head forward. Eyes open, mouth closed.

steps.title: Defensive Header
steps.description: Head for height and distance. Under the ball.

steps.title: Attacking Header
steps.description: Head down towards ground. Over the ball.

steps.title: Jump Timing
steps.description: Practice the timing of the leap without the ball.

steps.title: Jump Header
steps.description: Combine jump and header. Use arms for lift.

steps.title: Rest
steps.description: Neck stretches.

title: Cooldown Yoga
description: Essential recovery after a hard session.

steps.title: Forward Fold
steps.description: Stand tall, fold forward. Hang.

steps.title: Down Dog
steps.description: Push heels towards ground. Stretch calves.

steps.title: Cobra
steps.description: Hips on floor, chest up. Stretch abs.

steps.title: Twist
steps.description: Seated spinal twist.

steps.title: Hamstring Stretch
steps.description: Seated single leg fold.

steps.title: Meditation
steps.description: Close eyes. Focus on breath.
